vsParam:
Huh, what do you think, [px]?
My wings are beautiful today, right?

I conditioned my hair with a special care solution made of puni's
body fluid and early morning dew, the lustre should be different!

That's right, puni's body fluid!
Oh, this is a magic weapon for beauty?

I've had enough, you so stupid, [px].
You couldn't appreciate my beauty, that's a big loss for you.

Ah, Peppermint, good morning!
Hee hee, you are kawaii today!

Yeah, and your wings are more shining than usual!
You are so fashionable, Peppermint!

Ah, good morning! I know, right?
[px], see. Those who can appreciate will see it.

Ah, [px] senpai, this is not okay!
You can't treat Peppermint with that attitude!

Yeah! Peppermint is basically the
mascot of the Academy!
You must love her more! Right?

See! Hee hee.
I am as kawaii as a mascot!

Whoa, people in Fairyland would be shocked if they hear this...
They'd be amazed to see me, a fairy, being complimented by
humans and admire me.

Ah, fairy? Ah ha ha, come on.
Although you are kawaii, Peppermint...

You don't strike me as a "fairy",
after all, fairies give me an illusory feel...

What! T, that's not true!
I am a fairy, okay?

No, you don't like a fairy at all... Ah!
I can't talk with you anymore, I am going to be late for class!

Ah, you are right!
Bye, Peppermint!

Hmm, don't tease me! And don't smirk!
I am a fairy! A real fairy!

Huh... It now looks like that my preaching is not good enough!
You guys remember...

I'll let everyone in the Academy know that
I am a super super kawaii fairy one day!
